title: Get products within a TikTok Shop

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

parameters.name: bc_id
parameters.description: Business Center ID. To obtain the list of Business Centers that you have access to, use /bc/get/ .

parameters.name: store_id
parameters.description: TikTok Shop ID. To obtain the ID list of TikTok Shops associated with an ad account, use /store/list/ .

parameters.name: item_group_ids
parameters.description: Product SPU (standard product unit) IDs. Max size: 10.

parameters.name: ad_creation_eligible
parameters.description: The type of ad or campaign that the products are eligible for. Enum values: CUSTOM_SHOP_ADS : Shopping Ads, including Video Shopping Ads and Product Shopping Ads . GMV_MAX : Product GMV Max Campaigns . If this field is not specified, the response will not include the eligibility of the products for Product GMV Max Campaigns.

parameters.name: advertiser_id Conditional
parameters.description: Required when ad_creation_eligible is passed. Advertiser ID.

parameters.name: sort_field
parameters.description: Field to sort by. Enum values: min_price : the returned min_price field. historical_sales : the returned historical_sales field.

parameters.name: sort_type
parameters.description: Sorting order. Enum values: ASC : ascending. DESC : descending.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Current number of pages. Default value: 1. Value range: â‰¥ 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Page size. Default value: 10. Value range: 1-100.

examples.title: Get products available for Product GMV Max Campaigns
Get products available for Shopping Ads
Get products within a TikTok Shop without using the ad_creation_eligible filter

example.body:
{
    "code": 0,
    "message": "OK",
    "request_id": "{{request_id}}",
    "data": {
        "page_info": {
            "total_page": 1,
            "page": 1,
            "page_size": 100,
            "total_number": 2
        },
        "store_products": [
            {
                "currency": "GBP",
                "category": "Fashion Accessories > Eyewear > Glasses Cases & Accessories",
                "catalog_id": "{{catalog_id}}",
                "max_price": "0.07",
                "status": "AVAILABLE",
                "title": "{{title}}",
                "product_image_url": "{{product_image_url}}",
                "store_id": "{{store_id}}",
                "item_group_id": "{{item_group_id}}",
                "min_price": "0.07",
                "historical_sales": 18
            },
            {
                "currency": "GBP",
                "category": "Womenswear & Underwear > Women's Tops > Vests",
                "catalog_id": "{{catalog_id}}",
                "max_price": "0.7",
                "status": "NOT_AVAILABLE",
                "title": "{{title}}",
                "product_image_url": "{{product_image_url}}",
                "store_id": "{{store_id}}",
                "item_group_id": "{{item_group_id}}",
                "min_price": "0.7",
                "historical_sales": 0
            }
        ]
    }
}
